item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 3:30 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Stoop Coffee: A simple idea transformed my neighborhood (889 points | 308 comments)
2. The surreal joy of having an overprovisioned homelab (21 points | 4 comments)
3. Sell yourself, sell your work (102 points | 50 comments)

11. Gemini 2.5 (670 points | 298 comments)

13. Show HN: A website for sharing the "Good, Bad, and Why"s of urban spaces (22 points | 4 comments)
14. Svelte: $derived can now be overwritten (27 points | 23 comments)
15. Rest Easy (6 points | discuss)

22. You might want to stop running atop (220 points | 96 comments)
23. If you get the chance, always run more extra network fiber cabling (138 points | 141 comments)
24. OpenSMTPD and Maildrop working in concert (3 points | 3 comments)
25. My Favorite C++ Pattern: X Macros (2023) (89 points | 61 comments)
26. Activeloop (YC S18) Is Hiring Senior Python Back End and AI Search Engineers ( | hide)
27. Why is C the symbol for the speed of light? (2004) (121 points | 96 comments)
28. CIA Director Reveals Signal Comes Installed on Agency Computers (81 points | 58 comments)
29. The Jakt Programming Language (94 points | 25 comments)
30. What Killed Innovation? (92 points | 88 comments)
